extendedInfo.description: This is a very powerful, beautiful, and easy-to-use Music Player for Android devices. Listen to music with ease and elegance!This music player adds many features on top of the original project:- Automatically detect and organize all of your songs on your phone. You don't need to rearrange folders by yourself!- Lyrics support- Advanced Equalizer- Superior audio quality- Ability to play many file types including: mp3, mp4/m4a (including alac), ogg, wma*, flac, wav, ape, wv, tta, mpc, aiffThis music player is based on the open source Android Music Player developed by the Android Open Source Project (AOSP) team and adds many features on top of the original source code (some of which have been stated above). The original Android Music Player project is licensed by Apache 2.0 and its source code can be viewed here:http://android.googlesource.com/platform/packages/apps/Music.gitIf you would prefer to use the Android Music Player without our added features, a developer acleld JRTStudio has uploaded the unmodified source code here:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jrtstudio.musicIf you would like to try other Music Players to compare, we recommend you search for doubleTwist, Poweramp, PlayerPro, or Rocket Music Player as they are highly rated.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: A very lightweight player that has all the basic functions you need. It should just be updated to get ics support, like lockscreen and statusbar controls.
reviews.author: Stefan Verbeeck

reviews.title: Simple and effective...
reviews.comment: I use streaming services like spotify and subsonic for most of my listening, but I need to listen to music that\'s stored on my device when I don\'t have a clear data signal.  I\'ve tried a lot of the highly rated players that offer paid or ad-supported versions, but most of them offer a cluttered UI with unwanted features.  This player delivers a simple and intuitive interface for browsing and playing the music files I keep on my phone.  I love the party shuffle feature, and I simply cannot live without its \"play all\" playlist shortcut that google has removed from their official app.  I\'ll say it again.  This player delivers.
reviews.author: Jason Eldridge

reviews.title: Nice but..
reviews.comment: Yeah its nice but it could be nicer if you can download some musics... Because in my music library its just the same music it just have design... Sorry... Unistalling
reviews.author: Dhel Nicoline Tel

reviews.title: What I was looking for.
reviews.comment: I just wanted to simply play my mp3s.  Shuffle. Clean design. Running on my Google nexus 4.
reviews.author: Michael Willsey

reviews.title: Micromax canvas 2
reviews.comment: Awesome nice  I suggest to make this app as by default app in android phones having ice cream sandwich as it has not much features as lyrics support n all :-)

reviews.title: Xperia Neo V
reviews.comment: Oh! It\'s grate. My default music player stops working after flushing AC!D Audio. Two paid music app annoyed me by their performance. I\'ve uninstalled them. Then this music player amazed me. It has 100% support with AC!D Audio. Plz, install the both and enjoy.

reviews.comment: Only thing that actually has a working equalizer which is also free...

reviews.title: Nice but missing..
reviews.comment: Its an awesome music player and I love the features. Only thing missing is pressing the back button doesn\'t go back to the previous song.

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: This is a great free app that supports REAL gapless playback! With the additions of lock screen control and individual track art would definitely make it a 6 star app!

reviews.title: Doesn\'t support aiff
reviews.comment: The description claims that it does, but it will not display them or play if manually opened from a file browser.
